description: Phase indicates the status of the hydrate operation
name: applications.<name>.resources."argoproj.io".v1alpha1.Application.<name>.status.sourceHydrator.currentOperation.phase

description: SourceHydrator holds the hydrator config used for the hydrate operation
name: applications.<name>.resources."argoproj.io".v1alpha1.Application.<name>.status.sourceHydrator.currentOperation.sourceHydrator

description: DrySource specifies where the dry "don't repeat yourself" manifest source lives.
name: applications.<name>.resources."argoproj.io".v1alpha1.Application.<name>.status.sourceHydrator.currentOperation.sourceHydrator.drySource

description: Path is a directory path within the Git repository where the manifests are located

name: applications.<name>.resources."argoproj.io".v1alpha1.Application.<name>.status.sourceHydrator.currentOperation.sourceHydrator.drySource.targetRevision

description: HydrateTo specifies an optional "staging" location to push hydrated manifests to. An external system would then have to move manifests to the SyncSource, e.g. by pull request.

name: applications.<name>.resources."argoproj.io".v1alpha1.Application.<name>.status.sync.comparedTo.source.helm.ignoreMissingValueFiles

name: applications.<name>.resources."argoproj.io".v1alpha1.Application.<name>.status.sync.comparedTo.source.helm.kubeVersion

name: applications.<name>.resources."argoproj.io".v1alpha1.Application.<name>.status.sync.comparedTo.source.helm.namespace

description: Value is the value for the Helm parameter

name: applications.<name>.resources."argoproj.io".v1alpha1.Application.<name>.status.sync.comparedTo.source.kustomize.ignoreMissingComponents

name: applications.<name>.resources."argoproj.io".v1alpha1.Application.<name>.status.sync.comparedTo.source.kustomize.labelWithoutSelector
